title: Ep 173 | Trump's Viral Dance Moves, Why the Pandemic Savaged Our Culture, and Policy vs. Personality
description:
As the election looms large, Phil, Jase, and Zach weigh in on Trump's viral dance moves, fear of the coronavirus among voters, and the policies supported by Trump and Biden. Zach criticizes the unbiblical view of authority in the American church and points out how and why social distancing has damaged our culture. And the guys react to Pastor John Piper's controversial stance on whether it's more harmful to vote for politicians who promote bad policies or candidates with personality flaws.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
